textBox.richText: In light of the Christmas Season, I figured I’d apply somewhat of a Christmas-theme to the homepage. It isn’t much, but it’s the thought that counts. Compare it to the humble Christmas Scrooge and Tiny Tim (and others) had at their happy-love-each-other-fest at the end of A Christmas Carol; it’s pretty much the same. Edit: Now it looks like I’m staring up at the decorations. This was totally unintentional, but it makes it all the more… festive…? So yes, with Christmas right around the corner, I, like everyone else, cannot wait for these next two grueling weeks to end. And, ironically, I’m wishing these two weeks to fly by, when we’re only spending two weeks on vacation. I’m somewhat torn about wanting these next 336 hours to go by fast, when that’s the same amount of time I’ll be wanting to go slow once I’m actually on vacation. Hmm… Well anyway, seeing as it’s 2 in the morning, I should sleep, seeing as I have a cavalcade of work to do later. Yaaaay! Edit (again): Now there are STOCKINGS on the comment page. Oh man. So goddam festive it isn’t even funny.
